title: There shall be Heritage Conservation Committee for the areas within the jurisdiction of Planning Authority and Regional Plan area
clause_text: There shall be Heritage Conservation Committee for the areas within the jurisdiction of Planning Authority and Regional Plan area.This Committee shall be constituted by the Government in consultation with the Authority. The committee shall comprise of the following members:-
